TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IObservable`1<+ T>
generic <typename T> public interface class IObservable

span.span: The object that provides notification information.

summary.span: 定義推播通知的提供者。

span.span: Defines a provider for push-based notification.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和介面提供推播通知，也就是觀察者設計模式的通用的機制。The and interfaces provide a generalized mechanism for push-based notification, also known as the observer design pattern. 介面表示類別，用於傳送通知 （提供者）;介面表示類別，用於接收到 (observer)。The interface represents the class that sends notifications (the provider); the interface represents the class that receives them (the observer). `T` 代表提供通知資訊的類別。`T` represents the class that provides the notification information. 在某些發送為基礎的通知，請實作和`T`可代表相同的型別。In some push-based notifications, the implementation and `T` can represent the same type. 提供者必須實作單一方法，表示此觀察者想要接收推播通知。The provider must implement a single method, , that indicates that an observer wants to receive push-based notifications. 方法的呼叫端傳遞觀察者執行的個體。Callers to the method pass an instance of the observer. 此方法會傳回實作，可讓提供者已停止傳送之前隨時取消通知的觀察者。The method returns an implementation that enables observers to cancel notifications at any time before the provider has stopped sending them. 在任何時候，指定提供者可能有零個、 一個或多個觀察者。At any given time, a given provider may have zero, one, or multiple observers. 提供者負責儲存給觀察者的參考，並確定其有效後才會傳送通知。The provider is responsible for storing references to observers and ensuring that they are valid before it sends notifications. 介面不會進行任何假設的觀察者 」 或 「 通知會傳送的訂單數目。The interface does not make any assumptions about the number of observers or the order in which notifications are sent. 提供者藉由呼叫觀察者傳送通知的下列三種方法：The provider sends the following three kinds of notifications to the observer by calling methods: - 目前的資料。The current data. 提供者可以呼叫方法以傳遞觀察者`T`物件具有目前的資料、 變更的資料或新的資料。The provider can call the method to pass the observer a `T` object that has current data, changed data, or fresh data. - 錯誤狀況。An error condition. 提供者可以呼叫方法來通知觀察者發生某些錯誤狀況。The provider can call the method to notify the observer that some error condition has occurred. - 任何其他的資料。No further data. 提供者可以呼叫方法來通知觀察器發出它已完成傳送通知。The provider can call the method to notify the observer that it has finished sending notifications. ## Examples 下列範例說明觀察者設計模式。The following example illustrates the observer design pattern. 它會定義`Location`類別，其中包含緯度與經度的資訊。It defines a `Location` class that contains latitude and longitude information. [!code-csharp[System.IObserver.Class#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.iobserver.class/cs/provider.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.IObserver.Class#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.iobserver.class/vb/provider.vb#5)] `LocationTracker`類別提供實作。The `LocationTracker` class provides the implementation. 其`TrackLocation`方法會傳遞可為 null`Location`包含經度和緯度資料的物件。Its `TrackLocation` method is passed a nullable `Location` object that contains the latitude and longitude data. 如果`Location`值不是`null`，則`TrackLocation`方法呼叫的每個觀察者的方法。If the `Location` value is not `null`, the `TrackLocation` method calls the method of each observer. [!code-csharp[System.IObserver.Class#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.iobserver.class/cs/provider.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.IObserver.Class#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.iobserver.class/vb/provider.vb#6)] 如果`Location`值是`null`，則`TrackLocation`方法具現化`LocationUnknownException`物件，下列範例所示。If the `Location` value is `null`, the `TrackLocation` method instantiates a `LocationUnknownException` object, which is shown in the following example. 然後它會呼叫每個觀察者方法並將它傳遞`LocationUnknownException`物件。It then calls each observer's method and passes it the `LocationUnknownException` object. 請注意，`LocationUnknownException`衍生自，但不會加入任何新的成員。Note that `LocationUnknownException` derives from , but does not add any new members. [!code-csharp[System.IObserver.Class#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.iobserver.class/cs/provider.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.IObserver.Class#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.iobserver.class/vb/provider.vb#7)] 觀察器註冊以接收通知`TrackLocation`物件，藉由呼叫其方法，將觀察者物件的參考指派給私用泛型物件。Observers register to receive notifications from a `TrackLocation` object by calling its method, which assigns a reference to the observer object to a private generic object. 此方法會傳回`Unsubscriber`物件，它是實作，可讓觀察者停止接收通知。The method returns an `Unsubscriber` object, which is an implementation that enables observers to stop receiving notifications. `LocationTracker`類別也包含`EndTransmission`方法。The `LocationTracker` class also includes an `EndTransmission` method. 任何其他的位置資料可用時，此方法會呼叫每個觀察者方法然後清除 觀察者的內部清單。When no further location data is available, the method calls each observer's method and then clears the internal list of observers. 在此範例中，`LocationReporter`類別提供實作。In this example, the `LocationReporter` class provides the implementation. 在主控台顯示目前位置相關資訊。It displays information about the current location to the console. 其建構函式包含`name`參數，可讓`LocationReporter`其字串輸出中識別本身的執行個體。Its constructor includes a `name` parameter, which enables the `LocationReporter` instance to identify itself in its string output. 它也包含`Subscribe`方法，這個方法會包裝對提供者的呼叫方法。It also includes a `Subscribe` method, which wraps a call to the provider's method. 這可讓方法將傳回指定私用變數的參考。This allows the method to assign the returned reference to a private variable. `LocationReporter`類別也包含`Unsubscribe`方法，它會呼叫方法所傳回的物件方法。The `LocationReporter` class also includes an `Unsubscribe` method, which calls the method of the object that is returned by the method. 下列程式碼定義`LocationReporter`類別。The following code defines the `LocationReporter` class. [!code-csharp[System.IObserver.Class#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.iobserver.class/cs/observer.cs#8)] [!code-vb[System.IObserver.Class#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.iobserver.class/vb/observer.vb#8)] 提供者和觀察者，然後具現化下列程式碼。The following code then instantiates the provider and the observer. [!code-csharp[System.IObserver.Class#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.iobserver.class/cs/program.cs#9)] [!code-vb[System.IObserver.Class#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.iobserver.class/vb/module1.vb#9)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.IDisposable Subscribe(class System.IObserver`1<!T> observer) cil managed
Public Function Subscribe (observer As IObserver(Of Out T)) As IDisposable

span.span: The object that is to receive notifications.

summary.span: 通知提供者，觀察者將接收通知。

span.span: Notifies the provider that an observer is to receive notifications.

returns.span: 可讓觀察者在提供者完成傳送通知之前停止接收通知的介面的參考。

span.span: A reference to an interface that allows observers to stop receiving notifications before the provider has finished sending them.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 必須呼叫方法，以註冊推播通知的觀察者。The method must be called to register an observer for push-based notifications. 典型實作方法會進行下列作業：A typical implementation of the method does the following: - 它會儲存對觀察者的參考的集合物件中，例如物件。It stores a reference to the observer in a collection object, such as a object. - 它會傳回參考介面。It returns a reference to an interface. 這可讓觀察者取消訂閱 (也就是要停止接收通知) 提供者完成傳送，並稱為 「 訂閱者 」 之前方法。This enables observers to unsubscribe (that is, to stop receiving notifications) before the provider has finished sending them and called the subscriber's method. 在任何指定時間，特定執行個體實作會負責處理所有的訂用帳戶，並通知所有訂閱者。At any given time, a particular instance of an implementation is responsible for handling all subscriptions and notifying all subscribers. 除非特定的文件實作，否則為表示觀察者應該作任何假設實作，例如多個觀察者會收到的通知順序。Unless the documentation for a particular implementation indicates otherwise, observers should make no assumptions about the implementation, such as the order of notifications that multiple observers will receive. ## Examples 下列範例說明報告緯度和經度資訊的應用程式的方法。The following example illustrates the method for an application that reports latitude and longitude information. 它會定義集合物件，其中儲存所有觀察者的參考。It defines an collection object that stores references to all observers. 它也會傳回名為私用類別`Unsubscriber`實作介面，並可讓訂閱者停止接收事件通知。It also returns a private class named `Unsubscriber` that implements the interface and enables subscribers to stop receiving event notifications. 請參閱 < 範例 > 一節的主題的完整範例。See the Example section of the topic for the complete example. [!code-csharp[System.IObserver.Class#13](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.iobserver.class/cs/provider.cs#13)] [!code-vb[System.IObserver.Class#13](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.iobserver.class/vb/provider.vb#13)]
